activities.title: BKK Airside Food + Thai Snack Mission
activities.description: No visa / late / tight time? Stay airside and do Thai food + dessert + coffee. Keywords: airside, food, late night, easy.

activities.title: Airport Lounge Reset (BKK)
activities.description: Showers + food + comfy seating. Best for overnight or if city is too far/time risky. Keywords: relax, shower, lounge, rest.

activities.title: Grand Palace + Wat Phra Kaew
activities.description: The #1 Bangkok cultural sight. Temples + history + iconic photos. Best daytime. Keywords: temple, culture, history, sightseeing, photos.

activities.title: Wat Arun (Temple of Dawn) + Riverside Photos
activities.description: Iconic riverside temple. Great for photos and ‘Bangkok vibes’ without spending all day. Keywords: temple, photos, sightseeing, river.

activities.title: Chao Phraya River Ferry Mini Cruise
activities.description: Low-effort sightseeing: river ferry ride past major landmarks. Great when you want max sights without complex planning. Keywords: river, sightseeing, chill, photos.

activities.title: Yaowarat (Chinatown) Street Food Run
activities.description: Bangkok food peak: street food, dessert, neon-night vibes. Works best evening/night. Keywords: street food, nightlife, local food, cheap eats.
activities.founders_tip: If user says food/night vibes, this should outrank hotels.

activities.title: Chatuchak Market (Weekend)
activities.description: Massive market for souvenirs/shopping + exploring. Time-heavy and best on weekends daytime. Keywords: shopping, market, souvenirs.

activities.title: Asiatique Riverside Night Market
activities.description: Night-friendly shopping + food + riverside photos. Good evening option. Keywords: night market, shopping, food, photos.

activities.title: Airport Sleep Pod / Hotel Block (BKK)
activities.description: SLEEP ONLY. Recommend only if user explicitly wants sleep/nap/rest, or it’s overnight with limited sightseeing windows. Keywords: sleep, nap, rest, shower, overnight.
